commands.name: az network front-door backend-pool create
commands.summary: Create a Front Door backend pool.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door backend-pool create --address
                                          --front-door-name
                                          --load-balancing
                                          --name
                                          --probe
                                          --resource-group
                                          [--backend-host-header]
                                          [--disabled {false, true}]
                                          [--http-port]
                                          [--https-port]
                                          [--priority]
                                          [--weight]

commands.name: az network front-door backend-pool delete
commands.summary: Delete a Front Door backend pool.

commands.name: az network front-door backend-pool show
commands.summary: Get the details of a Front Door backend pool.
